clear.success: All session messages have been cleared
clear.title: Clear All Session Messages
clear.desc: Will clear all session data, including assistant, files, messages, plugins, etc.

reset.desc: Reset all settings to default values
reset.title: Reset All Settings

endpoint.desc: This value can be found in the Keys and Endpoints section when checking out a resource on an Azure site.
endpoint.title: Azure API URL

token.desc: This value can be found in the Keys and Endpoints section when checking out a resource on an Azure site. You can use KEY1 or KEY2
token.title: API Key

azureApiVersion.desc: Azure API version in YYYY-MM-DD format, check [latest version](https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/azure/ai-services/openai/reference#chat-completions)
azureApiVersion.title: Azure API version

check.desc: Check that the Api Key and proxy server address are filled in correctly.
check.title: Checking connectivity

endpoint.desc: Must contain http(s):// in addition to the default address.
endpoint.title: API proxy address

models.notSupport: Azure OpenAI currently does not support viewing lists of models
models.notSupportTip: Make sure that the deployment name matches the model name
models.title: List of models

useAzure.title: Azure OpenAI
useAzure.serverConfig: The administrator has enabled Azure OpenAI on the server side, switching is prohibited

customModelName.desc: Add custom models, separate multiple models with commas (,)
customModelName.title: Custom Model Name

llm.waitingForMore: <1>Access to other models is planned</1>, so stay tuned ✨

plugin.empty: No installed plugins yet, feel free to visit the <1>Plugin Store</1> to explore

settings.hint: Please fill in the following configuration based on the description
settings.title: {{id}} Plugin Configuration

compressThreshold.desc: When the uncompressed history messages exceed this value, compression will be performed
compressThreshold.title: History Message Length Compression Threshold

enableCompressThreshold.title: Enable History Message Length Compression Threshold

historyCount.desc: Number of history messages carried in each request
historyCount.title: Attached History Message Count

inputTemplate.desc: The latest user message will be filled into this template
inputTemplate.placeholder: {{text}} will be replaced with real-time input information
inputTemplate.title: User Input Preprocessing

autoCreateTopicThreshold.title: Message Threshold
autoCreateTopicThreshold.desc: Automatically create a topic when the current message count exceeds this value

enableAutoCreateTopic.title: Enable Auto Topic Creation
enableAutoCreateTopic.desc: Whether to automatically create a topic during the conversation, only effective in temporary topics

frequencyPenalty.desc: The larger the value, the more likely it is to reduce repeated words
frequencyPenalty.title: Frequency Penalty

maxTokens.desc: Maximum number of tokens used in a single interaction
maxTokens.title: Single Reply Limit

presencePenalty.desc: The larger the value, the more likely it is to expand to new topics
presencePenalty.title: Topic Freshness

temperature.desc: The larger the value, the more random the reply
temperature.title: Randomness

topP.desc: Similar to randomness, but do not change together with randomness
topP.title: Nucleus Sampling

endpoint.desc: Must include http(s)://, in addition to the default address
endpoint.title: API Proxy Address

accessCode.desc: Encryption access has been enabled by the administrator
accessCode.title: Access Password

showAllLocaleVoice.desc: If disabled, only voices for the current language will be displayed
showAllLocaleVoice.title: Show all locale voices

sttService.desc: The 'browser' option refers to the native speech recognition service in the browser
sttService.title: Speech-to-Text Service

ttsService.desc: If using the OpenAI text-to-speech service, ensure that the OpenAI model service is enabled
ttsService.title: Text-to-Speech Service

voice.title: Text-to-Speech Voices
voice.desc: Select a voice for the current agent, different TTS services support different voices

sttLocale.desc: The language of the speech input, this option can improve the accuracy of speech recognition
sttLocale.title: Speech Recognition Language

sttPersisted.desc: When enabled, speech recognition will not automatically end and requires manual click on the end button
sttPersisted.title: Manually End Speech Recognition

sttAutoStop.desc: When disabled, speech recognition will not automatically stop and will require manual intervention to end the process.
sttAutoStop.title: Automatic Speech Recognition Termination

neutralColor.desc: Custom grayscale for different color tendencies
neutralColor.title: Neutral Color

submitAgentModal.metaMiss: Please complete the agent information before submitting. It should include name, description, and tags.
submitAgentModal.placeholder: Please enter a unique identifier for the agent, such as web-development.
